title: Noorie
occurrences: They say Noorie drowned in the river
Noorie was so beautiful. - Innocent, unbeguiled, quiet
Noorie was the soul of our valleys, she gave fragrance to the pines
You were talking about Noorie. I thought I'd listen to you speak
How did you know we're discussing Noorie?
Now he's going to stand in front of Noorie's house; he'll wait and wait
Keep it. Noorie will need it for tea. - My enemy! Right in my backyard!
Khan, you've lost Noorie
Noorie is grown up. And Noorie is all I have
Now get lost and prepare for Noorie's wedding. Get going
Noorie is as much my child as she is yours
I want to marry Noorie
If you ever mention Noorie again, I'll kill you!
I brought along a ring. Will you give it to Noorie?
And I'm a relative to both sides. Noorie calls me her sister-in-law
I'm here to ask for Noorie. To be my daughter-in-law
Noorie is going to bring you much happiness!
Go and call Noorie
How can Noorie live all alone? She has no one
Noorie, we aren't your enemies
Yusuf stands between me and Noorie
Yes, I wish to live a while longer. - Then forget Noorie
Never to speak Noorie's name with your filthy tongue!
Whenever you mention Noorie... you will be respectful
Don't you even think about Noorie!
Only one name Noorie
Bring Noorie over tomorrow. Tomorrow morning
Noorie is dead!
Take care of Noorie's house. Look after Khairoo
Noorie is no more
Noorie's dog was outside, baying. Your "Tiger" was giving it chase
Noorie's! - How do you know?
Noorie! She has been found!
Noorie has been found!
What nonsense! Have you gone mad? - Really! Noorie has been found!
It's as if Noorie is alive, smiling!
Without Noorie, how can I live?
